Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and contribute to substantial growth. Given its value to you, we are offering it at a special introductory price of $950,000. This represents an exceptional opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive rate. We understand the importance of making informed decisions, so please feel free to ask any questions or request additional information. I look forward to your consideration and the possibility of bringing this product to your organization. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
